text: can you paste your code here?

I started a trial of the zenmate to give it a shot. And this code seemed to work just fine. I only have 2 languages - German and english. But have that first condition that says if any language is selected and the geoip is ‘ro’ then it will display whatever you want for Romania.

You can preview it here. <http://HubSpot-developers-f874yl-6970636.hs-sites.com/de-de/language-home>

Although I didnt make a nav for romania - I just added the txt ROMANIA haha. So switch your ip in and out of a romanian IP and you can test it
Perfect!! This worked for me too. Thank you so very much!!! I truly appreciate your time and help! :slightly_smiling_face: Can't thank enough :slightly_smiling_face:
Yayyy! hahaha Happy that this is what you were looking for! haha took us long enough but we got there! Woot woot!
